  physical_appearance: This is a blue and orange striped top. It has a high collar
 pleated cuffs and two large pockets on the front. The hem of the top features a lace border
 with teardrop patterns. The top is long-sleeved.

  subject_terms_1: paisley cultural diffusion tops (garments
 general) Peranakan

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Culture diffusion Clothing and dress Peranakan (Asian people)

  subject_terms_3: 

  sgcool_label_text: In a blue and orange striped fabric
 this top has a high collar
 pleated cuffs and large pockets on its front. A lace border with teardrop patterns is attached to its hem. This top may have been inspired by baju dalam
 which was of a similar construction and was popular in the 20th century as an undergarment worn beneath organdie baju panjangs. This is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.\r\n

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a blue and orange striped top. It has a high collar, pleated cuffs and two large pockets on the front. The hem of the top features a lace border, with teardrop patterns. The top is long-sleeved.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: In a blue and orange striped fabric, this top has a high collar, pleated cuffs and large pockets on its front. A lace border with teardrop patterns is attached to its hem. This top may have been inspired by baju dalam, which was of a similar construction and was popular in the 20th century as an undergarment worn beneath organdie baju panjangs. This is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
